PHRASE.LANG: ‘Working Class Hero’ was a scabrous and angry track from 1970’s ‘John Lennon/Plastic Ono Band’ album, in which Lennon rants against his perceived betters‘. [#Legal]
"Working Class Hero" est une chanson engagée, tiré de l'album "John Lennon/Plastic Ono Band" sorti en 1970, dans lequel John Lennon règle des comptes. [#Legal]

„Working Class Hero“ war ein unanständiger und wütender Titel aus dem 1970 erschienenen Album „John Lennon/Plastic Ono Band“, in dem Lennon gegen die vermeintlich über ihm stehende Klasse wettert. [#Legal]
"Working Class Hero" era un brano scabroso e rabbioso degli anni '70 contenuto nell'album di John Lennon con Plastic Ono Band, nel quale egli inveiva contro chi percepiva come "migliore". [#Legal]
“Working Class Hero” era un tema escabroso y lleno de ira del álbum “John Lennon/Plastic Ono Band” en el que Lennon la toma con los que consideraba superiores. [#Legal]
‘Working Class Hero’ was a scabrous and angry track from 1970’s ‘John Lennon/Plastic Ono Band’ album, in which Lennon rants against his perceived betters‘. [#Legal]
